article_title: Swiss Re Pumps Up Cash Returns Despite Profit Fall
article_text:
ZURICH—Swiss Re AG reported a sharp fall in fourth-quarter earnings, weighed down by costs involved in revamping part of its life and health business, but the reinsurance company decided to pump up its cash returns to shareholders.

Swiss Re proposed an increase in its regular dividend for 2014 as well as a special dividend while announcing plans...
